entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
